## Description {#details}

An abstract state for querying live call edges.

This interface uses the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a>&#39;s optimistic liveness information to compute the edges that are alive.

Definition at line 5494 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
